sentences: The workday stretched into the late hours of the night.
Despite the amount of text left to consider and the limited time in which to do it, the atmosphere remained upbeat throughout the day.
Several IPCC veterans seemed unsurprised at the long days and speed of progress.

Some delegates noted that the momentum and good will from the morning session began to give way to more serious disagreements as the day progressed, though they expressed hope that this trend would reverse on Saturday.
